H0.text: Slivovitz is a brandy distilled from which fruit. Apricot

H1.text: Slivovitz is a brandy distilled from which fruit. Cherry

H2.text: Slivovitz is a brandy distilled from which fruit. Peach

H3.text: Slivovitz is a brandy distilled from which fruit. Plum

A4.text: Slivovitz is a fruit spirit (or fruit brandy) made from damson plums

A5.text: Distilled spirits from different fruits are named similarly. For example, Czech meruňka 'apricot' → meruňkovice 'apricot spirit'; broskev 'peach' → broskvovice 'peach spirit'
